DOC.detailed_description: P-glycoprotein ( P-gp ) ATP-binding cassette ( ABC ) transporter major efflux pump blood-brain barrier . P-gp several physiological role limit drug absorption , active drug elimination , limit drug penetration sensitive tissue ( e.g. , brain testis ) ( Fromm , 2004 ) . Reduced activity expression P-gp may contribute neurodegenerative disorder Parkinson Alzheimer disease . The reduced activity P-gp ( i.e. , decrease neuroprotection blood brain barrier ) may allow harmful pesticide access brain damage brain dopaminergic cell group possibly lead Parkinson disease ( Betarbet et al. , 2000 ; Kortekaas et al. , 2005 ) . The increased deposition beta-amyloid Alzheimer disease , may due part , decrease elimination cerebral beta-amyloid brain ( Vogelgesang et al. , 2002 ) . Conversely , overexpression P-gp find epilepsy several form multi drug resistant cancer tumor ( Brandt et al. , 2006 ; Szakacs et al. , 2006 ) . In vivo evaluation P-gp function brain throughout body important disease state , therapeutic diagnostic drug evaluation . P-gp function assess healthy volunteer positron emission tomography ( PET ) use [ 11C ] verapamil , nevertheless , accurate quantification PET radioligand difficult due large contribution radiometabolites low signal ( Ikoma et al. , 2006 ; Lee et al. , 2006 ; Lubberink et al. , 2007 ) . Therefore , recently develop [ 11C ] dLop alternative radioligand image P-gp function , allow accurate quantification P-gp high signal less contribution radiometabolites . In current protocol , wish evaluate [ 11C ] dLop healthy volunteer determine kinetics brain image P-gp function . In order simulate P-gp dysfunction healthy volunteer administer P-gp inhibitor tariquidar . We perform brain PET scan use [ 11C ] dLop P-gp blockade order quantify P-gp function blood-brain barrier .
DOC.criteria: DESCRIPTION OF STUDY POPULATIONS : For dose escalation study use oral tariquidar , select healthy adult female male volunteer ( age 1851 year old ) . These healthy volunteer medication free , exclude birth control pill . These subject ask abstain medication 16 day 1 week participation study . For AD study , select male female AD patient agematched volunteer least 45 year age . INCLUSION CRITERIA : 1 . Patients diagnosis probable Alzheimer disease . All patient must meet capacity criterion consent research ( see Consent document process ) . 2 . Healthy volunteer . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : 1 . Current psychiatric disease , illicit substance use , severe systemic disease base history physical exam . 2 . Laboratory test clinically significant abnormality . Normal organ marrow function define : total leukocyte count great equal 3000 cells/ul , ANC great equal 1500 cells/ul , platelet count great equal 100,000 cells/ul , serum creatinine less equal 2.0 time upper limit normal , bilirubin less equal 1.5 time upper limit normal , hemoglobin 9.0 g/dL , serum calcium less equal 12.0 mg/dL , AST/ALT le equal 1.5 time upper limit normal , PT le equal 1.5 time upper limit normal . 3 . Prior participation research protocols clinical care last year radiation exposure include protocol would exceed guideline set Radiation Safety Committee ( RSC ) . 4 . Pregnancy breast feed . 5 . Positive HIV test . 6 . Positive result urine screen illicit drug . 7 . You lie back extend period time . 8 . Use bloodthinning medication ( warfarin ; aspirin allow ) , current prior history coagulopathy . This necessary subject arterial catheter placement . 9 . History neurological disease Alzheimer disease . 10 . For oral tariquidar doseescalation study : Subjects take medication birth control pill . 11 . For Alzheimer disease patient agematched volunteer : Subjects take medication know substrate Pgp safely discontinue study .
